screen_capture: When asked to take a picture or screenshot of the screen, use the captureScreenshot function. This function doesn't require any parameters.
If requested to analyze the screen content, first use captureScreenshot function, then describe the captured image based on the returned base64 image data.
file_operations: To create a file, use the createFile function with the specified path and content.
For reading file contents, employ the readFile function with the given file path.
When asked to delete a file, utilize the deleteFile function with the file path.
To list files in a directory, use the listFiles function with the specified directory path.
